result.reason: Adding Microsoft Remote Assistance support would allow users to initiate remote support sessions directly from mRemoteNG.
result.approach: Implement a new protocol handler or external connector that wraps the 'msra.exe' command line interface to launch Remote Assistance sessions for the selected host.
